name: Leave Them Behind
description:
Leave them behind is my entry into Ludum Dare 43.

The game is a 2d platformer where you have to control multiple characters to get one across to the other side of the screen. To accomplish this you must however leave the rest behind.

Controls:
    A and D to move left and right.
    Space to jump.
    Click on character with left mouse button to switch to that character.
    W to grab ceiling.
